tasks.label: Clean, Build and Install Package
args: Write-Host 'Uninstalling previous builds...' -ForegroundColor Red; uv tool uninstall rapporteur_helper; Write-Host 'Cleaning previous builds...' -ForegroundColor Yellow; if (Test-Path 'dist') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'dist' }; Write-Host 'Building package...' -ForegroundColor Green; uv build; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { Write-Host 'Installing package tool...' -ForegroundColor Blue; uv tool install --force .; Write-Host 'Package installed successfully!' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host 'Build failed!' -ForegroundColor Red; exit 1 }
